rows.label: qst006001_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, is this a stone tablet? It
does not seem all that old.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0002
rows.name:
The people of Luxuria once
made their dwellings among
the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm afraid that sentence
has no conclusion.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0006
rows.name: No conclusion? What do you mean?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0007
rows.name:
A piece of the stone tablet is missing,
so the sentence is unfinished.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0008
rows.name:
Then if we want to know
the full story, we have to
find the missing piece?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0009
rows.name:
Apparently the proprietor
found this tablet around
the Genbu Drifts area.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0012
rows.name:
We must search far and wide for as
many missing pieces as it takes!

rows.label: qst006001_msg0013
rows.name:
And then of course we will return
here to examine the completed tablet.
Is that understood, my retainers?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0014
rows.name: Haha... As you wish, Your Majesty.
